entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
